entry.title: Frame Back Housing Assembly Compatible With iPhone 7
entry.summary:
Vendor: Jerry
Type: Housing
Price: 64.99

Description

The iPhone 7 Back Housing with Power and Volume Flex, Buttons and Rear Camera Lens assembly is designed to allow the replacement of the broken back of your device. This part has the same coloration as the Apple Original Back Housing.

Warranty

Unlockr offers a 1 year on this item. Our warranty does not cover physical damage caused by the technician or any other reason. Please see our full warranty and returns policy for extra details.

Part Type iPhone Back Housing
Compatible Model iPhone 7 (4.7")
Model Number A1660 / A1778 / A1779
Manufacturer Unlockr
Warranty 1 Year Warranty

entry.title: iPhone 7 Salvaged Front-Facing Camera Assembly With Sensors (2-Pack)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Chuck
Type: Front Camera
Price: 28.99

Description

This iPhone 7 Salvaged Front-Facing Camera with Sensors Flex is designed to allow the replacement of your broken camera and is salvaged from a broken device. It includes the front-facing camera, secondary microphone, ambient light and proximity sensors.

Warranty

Unlockr offers a 1 year on this item. Our warranty does not cover physical damage caused by the technician or any other reason. Please see our full warranty and returns policy for extra details.

Part Type iPhone Front-Facing Camera
Compatible Model iPhone 7 (4.7")
Model Number A1661 / A1784 / A1785
Manufacturer Unlockr
Warranty 1 Year Warranty

entry.title: iPhone Screen Waterproof Frame Bezel Seal Tape Adhesive (Pack of 10)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Jerry
Type: LCD Adhesives
Price: 7.99 - 8.99 (10 variants)

This iPhone waterproof Frame Bezel Seal Adhesive is required to ensure the LCD is properly attached to the frame of the phone after a screen repair.

This is a pack of 10 LCD adhesives.

Warranty

Unlockr offers a 1 year on this item. Our warranty does not cover physical damage caused by the technician or any other reason. Please see our full warranty and returns policy for extra details.

Part Type Adhesive Strips
Manufacturer Unlockr
Warranty 1 Year Warranty

entry.title: iPhone 7 Earpiece Speaker Mesh Bracket
entry.summary:
Vendor: Chuck
Type: Other Part
Price: 3.99

Important Notice: This item can take 5-10 days to fulfill.


Replace the plastic bracket that holds the earpiece speaker dust proof mesh in place against the inside of the front panel assembly.The gasket that seals this bracket to the earpiece speaker is included.The dust proof mesh and adhesive are not included.

entry.title: iPhone 7 Rear Camera Lock Bracket
entry.summary:
Vendor: Chuck
Type: Other Part
Price: 6.99

Important Notice: This item can take 5-10 days to fulfill.


This metal bracket secures the rear-facing camera to the rear case.

entry.title: iPhone 7 Display Backlight
entry.summary:
Vendor: Chuck
Type: Backlight
Price: 34.99

Important Notice: This item can take 5-10 days to fulfill.


Replace the backlight film on the display assembly. This part includes only the back layer of the display assembly that provides the light that shines through the LCD. The LCD and glass digitizer are not included. This part requires micro soldering of one cable and other professional repair skills. It is not intended for a beginner or DIY repair.

entry.title: iPhone 7 Earpiece Speaker Gasket
entry.summary:
Vendor: Chuck
Type: Other Part
Price: 2.99

Important Notice: This item can take 5-10 days to fulfill.


Replace the gasket that seals the face of the earpiece speaker to the back of the earpiece speaker dust proof mesh bracket on the inside of the front panel assembly.

entry.title: iPhone 7 Case Button Set
entry.summary:
Vendor: Chuck
Type: Other Part
Price: 9.99

Important Notice: This item can take 5-10 days to fulfill.


This set of exterior case buttons includes the Power/Lock Button, Volume Buttons, and the Vibrate/Ring Switch for replacing buttons with cosmetic troubles.These are the button parts visible on the outside of the case.The actual buttons and switch that do all the work are attached to the internal button cables.
